summary: Tony's Guest - Chapter 1 - Starkvenger - Iron Man (Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Tony's Guest - Chapter 1 - Starkvenger - Iron Man (Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description: Tony goes out for the day to see a friend of his, and the avengers get suspicious when he won’t tell them who his mysterious friend is. So naturally, they stalk him and Harley Keener, (aka the boy from IM3) around for the day. What happens when the team finds out that there’s more to Their favorite billionaire genius than they realize?

blog.name: ao3feed-stony
blog.title: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers
blog.description: stony ao3 fan fic rss feed

summary: Kiss it and Make it Better
title: Kiss it and Make it Better
body:
by snarkymuch

*This is a two part to my series based on my story Riding the Tiger. With some imagination, you might be able to muddle your way through this, but you really need to read the main story first to make sense.*

When things between Steve, Bucky, and Tony begin to slowly move forward, Tony realizes he’s going to need to bare his scars for his boyfriends to see. The idea sends him into a panic, but thankfully, Sam is in the right place at the right time to help him with his feelings. With some wisdom from Sam, he goes to face his fears and bring his relationship with Steve and Bucky a little closer.

Words: 3124, Chapters: ½, Language: English

Series: Part 5 of twisted around and backwards

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Sam Wilson (Marvel)
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark, Tony Stark & Sam Wilson
  • Additional Tags: Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Bipolar Disorder, Bipolar Tony Stark, References to Past Suicide Attempt, Scars, Sam Wilson Is a Good Bro, Talking Like Adults, Polyamory, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, kisses happen, Anxiety Attacks, Tony Stark Has Issues

summary: you break it, you buy it
title: you break it, you buy it
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2I8z1Q4

by sumpetals

School is hard enough for the average teen. Throw in fighting crime and some unresolved mental health issues, Peter’s got it rough.

or: peter is a work in progress. tony pretends he doesn’t get paid enough for this, but at the root of it, he just wants the kid to be okay.

summary:
tony: i think stephen likes me.
tony: when someone raises one eyebrow at you a lot, it means they feel like- i don’t know-...
body:
tony: i think stephen likes me.

tony: when someone raises one eyebrow at you a lot, it means they feel like- i don’t know- lustful towards you, right?

rhodey: what? no-

tony: shut up, let me have this.

blog.name: thecomicon

summary: Tony Stark: Iron Man #12 Goes A Little Middle-Earth And A Little Metal
title: Tony Stark: Iron Man #12 Goes A Little Middle-Earth And A Little Metal
body:
Tony Stark: Iron Man #12 Goes A Little Middle-Earth And A Little Metal

Gail Simone has very publicly stated that she has one Iron Man story that she wants to tell. Lucky for us, War of the Realms finally gives her the opportunity to do exactly that in Tony Stark: Iron Man #12. And guess what–it involves a DRAGON.

Cover by Alexander Lozano

Gail Simone, Paolo Vilanelli, Edgar Delgado, and Joe Caramagna tell us the story of Sir Anthony and the dragon.

A short…

View On WordPress
